TEXT.TITLE: CHEMFIX <CFIX> BUYS REST OF UNIT
TEXT.BODY: Chemfix Technologies Inc said it has acquired the 50 pct of its VenVirotek unit that it did not already own from Ventura, Calif., businessmen for undisclosed terms. Reuter
